mapper.insert: insert into public.orders (id, order_subject, order_date, ship_date, required_date, freight, sales_tax, transaction_status, error_message, fulfilled, is_paid, payment_date, is_active, created_by, updated_by, created_timestamp, updated_timestamp, shipper_id, payment_id, user_id ) values (#{id}, #{orderSubject}, #{orderDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{shipDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{requiredDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{freight}, #{salesTax,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{transactionStatus}, #{errorMessage}, #{fulfilled}, #{isPaid}, #{paymentDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{isActive}, #{createdBy}, #{updatedBy}, #{createdTimestamp}, #{updatedTimestamp}, #{shipperId}, #{paymentId}, #{userId} )
mapper.update: update public.orders set order_subject = #{orderSubject}, order_date = #{orderDate,jdbcType=DATE}, ship_date = #{shipDate,jdbcType=DATE}, required_date = #{requiredDate,jdbcType=DATE}, freight = #{freight}, sales_tax = #{salesTax,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, transaction_status = #{transactionStatus}, error_message = #{errorMessage}, fulfilled = #{fulfilled}, is_paid = #{isPaid}, payment_date = #{paymentDate,jdbcType=DATE}, is_active = #{isActive}, created_by = #{createdBy}, updated_by = #{updatedBy}, created_timestamp = #{createdTimestamp}, updated_timestamp = #{updatedTimestamp}, shipper_id = #{shipperId}, payment_id = #{paymentId}, user_id = #{userId} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, order_subject, order_date, ship_date, required_date, freight, sales_tax, transaction_status, error_message, fulfilled, is_paid, payment_date, is_active, created_by, updated_by, created_timestamp, updated_timestamp, shipper_id, payment_id, user_id from public.orders where id = #{id}

select id, order_subject, order_date, ship_date, required_date, freight, sales_tax, transaction_status, error_message, fulfilled, is_paid, payment_date, is_active, created_by, updated_by, created_timestamp, updated_timestamp, shipper_id, payment_id, user_id from public.orders
